```{r kaloritabell,results="asis"}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(flextable)
library(ggplot2)
library(readxl)
library(kableExtra)

kaloritabell <- read_excel("Regning av kaloriforbruk.xlsx")%>%
  select(id, group, time, arbec_mean_vo2_ml_min, arbec_mean_RER, kacl_min, kj_min) %>%
   filter(id != "tr031 10541") %>%
  filter(id != "tr031 11421") %>%
  filter(id != "tr031 13404") %>%
  filter(id != "tr031 004") %>%
  filter(id != "tr031 008") %>%
  filter(id != "tr031 001") %>%
  filter(id != "tr031 016") %>%
  filter(id != "tr031 014") %>%
  print()
```
